channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 根据彭博亿万富翁指数（Bloomberg Billionaires Index），杰夫-贝佐斯（Jeff Bezos）周一取代埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk），重夺世界首富宝座。
item.description:
Jeff Bezos took back his spot as the world's richest man on Monday, dethroning Elon Musk, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index.

Bezos' net worth stands at $200 billion, according to the tracker, surpassing Musk's $198 billionhttps://t.co/XbJkOGfmOY pic.twitter.com/Z1ZNOIvnaH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：战争结束多年后，伊拉克人开始寻找新的沙漠度假胜地。远离大城市的喧嚣和繁华，伊拉克年轻人在经历多年冲突后，越来越多地利用重新获得的安全感，探索该国宁静的沙漠度假胜地。
item.description:
VIDEO: Years removed from war, Iraqis seek new desert escapades.

Far from the hustle and bustle of major cities, young Iraqis are increasingly taking advantage of a renewed sense of safety to explore the country's serene desert getaways after years of conflict pic.twitter.com/0MNgOvaJ55

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: #非政府组织称，伊朗去年处决了至少834人，为2015年以来最高
item.description:
#BREAKING Iran executed at least 834 people last year, highest since 2015, say NGOs pic.twitter.com/Zub0hHTiUh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在亚马逊河畔，孩子们互相抛掷芒果，这种童年的消遣在巴西已变成了一种正式的体育运动，甚至在里约热内卢令人称道的沙滩运动中也占有一席之地。
item.description:
Brazil sinks its teeth into mango-inspired ballgame.

A childhood pastime of kids tossing mangoes to each other in the Amazon has transformed into a proper sport in Brazil, even finding a place among the vaunted beach games played in Rio de Janeirohttps://t.co/GymSWKRnpY pic.twitter.com/gaC24tAdOR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：随着美国竞选活动的展开，沙斯塔县放弃了电子投票机。由于怀疑以前的选举（包括 2020 年的投票）被窃取，沙斯塔县监事会决定终止租用 Dominion 投票机的合同，...
item.description:
VIDEO: Shasta County ditches electronic voting machines as US campaign unfolds.

Based on suspicions that previous elections were stolen, including the 2020 vote, the Shasta County's Board of Supervisors has decided to end a contract for their lease of Dominion voting machines,… pic.twitter.com/Ik7aTxDVMP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 全国人民代表大会将在为期一周的会议中重点讨论经济和安全挑战。
item.description:
China sets a growth target of 5% - a far cry from the double-digit expansion that for years drove the world's second-largest economy.

The National People's Congress is set to focus on economic and security challenges during the week-long conclavehttps://t.co/fnopf1VCWU pic.twitter.com/PJGMwVQDIO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 丹佛野马队放走了老将四分卫拉塞尔-威尔逊（Russell Wilson），为美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）历史上最灾难性的交易之一划上了句号。
item.description:
The Denver Broncos released veteran quarterback Russell Wilson, drawing a line under one of the most calamitous deals in NFL history.https://t.co/cxuBiw9arD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: #工作报告：2024 年中国军事预算将增长 7.2
item.description:
#BREAKING China's military budget to increase by 7.2 percent in 2024: work report pic.twitter.com/iyFhezSPDw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: #工作报告：中国为 2024 年设定 5%的经济增长目标
item.description:
#BREAKING China sets 5 percent economic growth goal for 2024: work report pic.twitter.com/LvtoufrQL4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在世界第二大经济体面临严峻挑战之际，中国共产党高层官员将在年度会议上公布数十年来最低的增长目标。
item.description:
China is set to unveil some of its lowest growth targets in decades when top Communist Party officials begin an annual meeting as the world's second largest economy faces dire headwinds.https://t.co/KHR4LeL3GV pic.twitter.com/Chraz0TPi8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 阿森纳 6-0 击败谢菲尔德联队，继续在英超联赛冠军争夺战中紧追利物浦和曼城。#AFPSports
item.description:
Arsenal entered the record books as a 6-0 demolition of Sheffield United kept the Gunners on Liverpool and Manchester City's tails in the Premier League title race. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/Swv5cAUyTS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 以色列召回了其驻联合国大使，因为对哈马斯武装分子在 10 月 7 日袭击中性侵指控的处理引发了紧张局势。
item.description:
Israel recalled its ambassador to the UN as tensions erupted over the handling of allegations of sexual assault by Hamas militants during the October 7 attacks.https://t.co/fgdy03NMK2 pic.twitter.com/qRaoBpUNtr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 推特公司前高管起诉埃隆-马斯克，称这位亿万富翁在接管这家社交媒体公司并解雇他们之后，没有向他们支付近 1.3 亿美元。
item.description:
Former top executives of Twitter sued Elon Musk saying he has failed to pay them nearly $130 million after the billionaire took over the social media company and dismissed them.https://t.co/6nN7b8F9iY pic.twitter.com/WyrPGyQLue

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #美国副总统哈里斯就加沙问题向以色列总统甘兹表达 "深切关注"：声明
item.description:
#BREAKING US VP Harris expresses 'deep concern' on Gaza to Israel's Gantz: statement pic.twitter.com/Bcg4ZGSlsO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 一位美国特使说，外交解决方案是结束以色列-哈马斯战争爆发后黎巴嫩真主党与以色列之间近五个月来愈演愈烈的敌对行动的关键。
item.description:
A US envoy said a diplomatic solution was key to ending nearly five months of intensifying hostilities between Lebanon's Hezbollah and Israel after the eruption of the Israel-Hamas war.https://t.co/Rc1SZbIrql pic.twitter.com/m8NTpMAaSq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）批评古巴禁止著名活动家玛莎-比阿特丽斯-罗克（Martha Beatriz Roque）访问白宫领奖。
item.description:
US Secretary of State Antony Blinken criticized Cuba for barring a prominent activist, Martha Beatriz Roque, from visiting the White House to receive an award.https://t.co/DuQUMfNMou pic.twitter.com/3SWAwdiAbA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #切尔西球星萨姆-科尔（Sam Kerr）被指控犯有 "种族严重罪行"：英国警方
item.description:
#BREAKING Chelsea star Sam Kerr charged with 'racially aggravated offence': UK police pic.twitter.com/wo9uoTRNOK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在多年冲突之后，一场马匹繁育比赛让来自四分五裂的利比亚各地的马术爱好者汇聚一堂，展现了罕见的团结。
item.description:
A horse breeding competition has brought together equestrians from across divided Libya in a rare show of unity after years of conflict.https://t.co/AefHuo1b0Y pic.twitter.com/Nje1ifRHFr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统宣布将关闭被他称为前左派政府 "宣传 "喉舌的国家通讯社 Telam 之后，阿根廷政府暂停了 Telam 的运营。
item.description:
Argentina's government suspended the Telam state news agency in the wake of an announcement by President Javier Milei that he would shut down what he called a mouthpiece of "propaganda" for previous leftist administrations.https://t.co/lp6ljW1UWL pic.twitter.com/fa3IzSCKUx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 透视装的潮流主导了巴黎时装周，这表明尽管存在实际甚至法律方面的挑战，但人们对暴露服装的需求依然强劲。
item.description:
The trend for see-through clothes has dominated Paris Fashion Week, showing that demand for revealing outfits is still going strong despite practical and even legal challenges.https://t.co/1NyW7fBcoY pic.twitter.com/WX1pDe4PNG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 加沙的医院饱受打击、围困和袭击之苦，但在日常工作中，巴勒斯坦领土上严重的电力短缺对救生护理工作构成了持久的威胁。
item.description:
Gaza's hospitals have been wracked by strikes, sieges and raids, but on a day-to-day basis, it is the Palestinian territory's acute power shortages that pose an enduring risk to life-saving care.https://t.co/AcsHB5PAmw pic.twitter.com/yXUTUIDQTq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #联合国负责人否认压制有关哈马斯强奸案的报告：发言人
item.description:
#BREAKING UN chief denies silencing report on Hamas rapes: spokesman pic.twitter.com/X7coQkADjg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在 ChatGPT 面临更多竞争对手之际，生成式人工智能领域的主要企业 Anthropic 宣布推出新模型，为其 Claude 聊天机器人提供支持。
item.description:
Anthropic, a major player in generative artificial intelligence, announced new models to fuel its Claude chatbot as ChatGPT faces more rivals.https://t.co/b6J57Fus9X pic.twitter.com/13UN7oxboZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #联合国援助巴勒斯坦机构称以色列当局对被拘留的工作人员施以酷刑
item.description:
#BREAKING UN agency for Palestinians says Israel authorities tortured detained staff pic.twitter.com/rcAxnOST97

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 被指控在网上泄露五角大楼绝密文件的美国空军飞行员在联邦法院认罪，根据协议，他接受大约 16 年的监禁，以换取检察官撤销更严重的间谍罪指控。
item.description:
The US airman accused of leaking top secret Pentagon documents online pleaded guilty in federal court under a deal in which he accepted a roughly 16-year imprisonment in return for prosecutors dropping more serious espionage charges.https://t.co/dIzenjx1w2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #有合理理由相信 "哈马斯袭击期间发生了强奸案：联合国报告
item.description:
#BREAKING 'Reasonable grounds to believe' rapes committed during Hamas attacks: UN report pic.twitter.com/IqfHDqAcHs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 厄瓜多尔总检察长办公室称，在对涉嫌贩毒的官员进行的所谓 "清洗 "调查中，包括法官和政客在内的十二人被捕。
item.description:
Twelve people, including judges and politicians, were arrested in Ecuador as part of a so-called "Purge" probe into officials suspected of ties to drug trafficking, the attorney general's office said.https://t.co/1BLwf8xgjW pic.twitter.com/hKsjYJrmYU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 周一，巴黎时装周的倒数第二天，两位最具环保意识的时装设计师展示了他们的秋冬系列。
item.description:
Two of fashion's most environmentally conscious designers presented their autumn-winter collections on Monday, the penultimate day of Paris Fashion Week.https://t.co/cWiuBsYZBJ pic.twitter.com/VwaOXxivXJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #以色列因对哈马斯性暴力 "保持沉默 "召回联合国大使

#BREAKING Israel recalls its UN ambassador over 'silence' on Hamas sexual violence pic.twitter.com/qexQYaWTrT

item.title: #法国议会投票决定将堕胎作为一项宪法权利
item.description:
#BREAKING French parliament votes to make abortion a constitutional right pic.twitter.com/dYLsiUfrv7
